english.segment1: Verse 1: Even As the World began. the stars they sang and all the angels. shouted for joy. shouted for joy. And looking back through history. Your people they have always had. A song they must sing. A song they must sing
english.segment2: PreChorus: We Are The People of God. We'll Sing Your Song. Here on the earth
english.segment3: Chorus: All over the world Your song will resound. All over the world Your praises ring out. We're living to see You're name and renown. All over the world
english.segment4: Verse 2: Young and old, near and far. there's a place for ev'ry heart to. join in your song. join in your song. And ev'ry nation tribe and tongue. come together join as one. give glory to God. glory to God
english.segment5: Bridge: Great is Your name. and great will be your song (repeat). We lift up our hands and pray. We lift up our hands and pray. for holy is Your name
english.segment6: Other: Your name, Your renown, are the desire of our souls. Your fame, Your glory, Your song, for you alone are God, You alone.
